Uses of Interface
org.springframework.expression.TypeConverter

  • Packages that use TypeConverter 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.expression
    Core abstractions behind the Spring Expression Language.
    org.springframework.expression.common
    Common utility classes behind the Spring Expression Language.
    org.springframework.expression.spel
    SpEL's central implementation package.
    org.springframework.expression.spel.support
    SpEL's default implementations for various core abstractions.

    • Uses of TypeConverter in org.springframework.expression

      Methods in org.springframework.expression that return TypeConverter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TypeConverter EvaluationContext.getTypeConverter()
      Return a type converter that can convert (or coerce) a value from one type to another.
